name: Tally
tagline: Beautiful forms that connect directly to Notion databases
description: Tally is the simplest way to create forms that write directly to your Notion databases. No complex setup, no coding required. Just connect your Notion database and start collecting responses in seconds.
useCases: Lead capture forms for marketing teams

rawData.description: Tally is the free online form builder that creates forms with the ease of creating a doc. No coding. No time-consuming setup. Native Notion integration means responses flow directly into your Notion databases without any middleman or automation tool.

enhancedContent.overview: Tally transforms how Notion users collect data by providing a seamless form-building experience that connects directly to your workspace databases. This intuitive form builder eliminates the complexity typically associated with data collection tools, offering a document-like editing experience that anyone can master without technical expertise. The platform's standout feature is its direct integration with Notion databases, ensuring that every form submission automatically populates your workspace without requiring third-party automation tools or complex workflows. Whether you're gathering customer feedback, processing job applications, or managing event registrations, Tally streamlines the entire process from form creation to data organization within your existing Notion setup.
problemsSolved: Manual data entry from external forms into Notion databases
Complex setup processes for integrating form builders with Notion
Limited customization options in basic form solutions
solutionsBenefits: Automatic data population eliminates manual transfer and reduces errors
Native integration means instant setup without technical configuration
Advanced features like conditional logic and payments enhance form functionality
idealFor: Marketing teams tracking leads and campaigns in Notion
Small businesses processing orders and customer inquiries
notRecommendedFor: Users needing complex enterprise-level form features
Teams requiring advanced payment processing beyond basic Stripe integration

faqs.question: How does this integrate with Notion?
faqs.answer: Tally connects directly to your Notion databases through a native integration, automatically sending form responses to designated database tables without requiring Zapier or other automation tools.

faqs.question: What's the setup time?
faqs.answer: Most users can create and connect their first form to Notion within 10-15 minutes, thanks to the intuitive drag-and-drop builder and straightforward database connection process.

faqs.question: Is there a free plan?
faqs.answer: Yes, Tally offers a generous free tier with unlimited forms and responses, making it accessible for individuals and small teams. Premium features like custom domains and branding removal require a paid plan.

faqs.question: What are the main use cases for Notion users?
faqs.answer: Popular applications include lead generation forms for marketing databases, customer feedback surveys, job application tracking, event registration management, and order processing for small businesses.
